description: When shaping the domain, distinguish implementation details from domain responsibilities

examples.description: Story steps describing WHAT a concept does need domain mapping
examples.content: Project manages Project Bot State, Workflow orders Behavior Action Steps, Project creates folder structure

examples.description: Story steps describing HOW something is stored may not need domain responsibility
examples.content: Project Bot State stores to File System, Workflow State stores Current Behavior Name, File System writes file

examples.description: Don't require domain responsibility for pure implementation details
examples.content: File System writes file - This is implementation detail, may not need domain responsibility

examples.description: Don't skip domain mapping for behavioral responsibilities
examples.content: Project manages Project Bot State - This describes WHAT Project does, needs domain responsibility
